Of course, I own one!

False.

The user below me knows me here in this forum by my old name.

True, my grandmother taught me years ago.

User below me has an unexpected skill.

True. I am exceptionally skilled in converting oxygen to carbon dioxide.

The user below me is the user not above me which is below me but above me.

True. I am not directly above you, I am below you right now, and I am above you but further up.

The user below me is wondering how I deciphered Kalawang's riddle.

False, It was a riddle?

The user below me wants to see my Rocket designs.

Maybe...

The user below me wants to see my MOMV Space-Bike.

True. I am not directly above you, I am below you right now, and I am above you but further up.

The user below me is wondering how I deciphered Kalawang's riddle.

Actually it's Trekkette who is above his first post

This doesn't disrupt anything, does it?

Actually it's Trekkette who is above his first post

This doesn't disrupt anything, does it?

No it doesn't. The fact that she's there changes nothing.

True. Gimme a link, wanna test the shiat out of it. ;-)

True.

False

False. And I missed the last space shuttle launch ;_;

false I wanted to but i had to get some sleep

no

False. I must not be ragin'. (for a better experience, read in a pirate accent)

True, crossovers would be fun to see! Jeb riding a SRB in other games. Fun!
